Package: com.android.builder.tasks

[Java] Interface Task<T>

  • Task that can be created asynchronously.

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        void run(Job<T> job, JobContext<T> context)
        Executes the task with the context object to retrieve and store inter-tasks information.

    • Method Detail

      • public void run(@com.android.annotations.NonNull Job<T> job, @com.android.annotations.NonNull JobContext<T> context)

        Executes the task with the context object to retrieve and store inter-tasks information.

        throws:
        java.io.IOException an exception occured while processing the task.
        Parameters:
        context - the task contextual object
